title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Improvement Strategies through Example-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain language problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy by analyzing task examples
Learners can verbally reproduce the process of understanding complex linguistic structures at over 70% accuracy by applying self-explanation techniques
Learners can apply cognitive load management strategies (e.g., distributed practice, selective focus on essential elements) to actual language tasks at over 60% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
